original_title: Lanka Woman Magazine hosts exclusive ‘Coffee Moments’ event for International Women’s Day
original_body_lines: Lanka Woman, Sri Lanka’s premier women’s magazine, is proud to announce it’s first-ever Women’s Day event: “Coffee Moments with Lanka Woman.” The exclusive invite-only high tea event will take place on 24 March 2023, at Jetwing Colombo 07, and will feature a keynote address and panel discussion on “Cracking the Code: Innovation and Technology for a Gender-Equal Future.”

Group Executive Director of Sun Match Company Gowri Rajan will deliver the keynote address, and the panel discussion will feature industry leaders including  Master Card Director Mahesha Amarasooriya, CIMA Country Head for Sri Lanka and Maldives  Zahara Ansary, Wavemaker Sri Lanka Chief Growth Officer Vino De Silva, , and Kapruka Founder/ Chairman Dulith Herath.

As the only magazine in the country catering to middle and senior professional women, Lanka Woman is partnering with some of the most prominent brands in Sri Lanka to celebrate Women’s Day. Singer Sri Lanka as the lifestyle partner, Nescafe as the beverage partner, Christell Skin Clinic as the cosmetics and wellness partner, Vivya from Hemas as the beauty partner, and Huff and Dee from No Limit as the clothing partner are joining Lanka Woman in this celebration.

Lanka Woman is thrilled to host and look forward to this engaging and enlightening event that celebrates women and their achievements. Join us for “Coffee Moments with Lanka Woman” on 24 March 2023 for a memorable celebration of International Women’s Day.
